Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:@/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Domain.description: The name of the Windows domain that the FSx for Windows server belongs to.
Domain.markdownDescription:
The name of the Windows domain that the FSx for Windows server belongs to.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 253  
Pattern: ^([A-Za-z0-9]+[A-Za-z0-9-.]*)*[A-Za-z0-9-]*[A-Za-z0-9]$  
Update requires: Replacement

FsxFilesystemArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the FSx for Windows file system.
FsxFilesystemArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the FSx for Windows file system.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):fsx:[a-z\-0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:file-system/fs-.*$  
Update requires: Replacement

Password.description: The password of the user who has the permissions to access files and folders in the FSx for Windows file system.
Password.markdownDescription:
The password of the user who has the permissions to access files and folders in the FSx for Windows file system.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 104  
Pattern: ^.{0,104}$  
Update requires: Replacement

SecurityGroupArns.description: The ARNs of the security groups that are to use to configure the FSx for Windows file system.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):ec2:[a-z\-0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:security-group/.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

SecurityGroupArns.markdownDescription:
The ARNs of the security groups that are to use to configure the FSx for Windows file system.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

Subdirectory.description: A subdirectory in the location's path.
Subdirectory.markdownDescription:
A subdirectory in the location's path.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4096  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_\-\+\./\(\)\$\p{Zs}]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

User.description: The user who has the permissions to access files and folders in the FSx for Windows file system.
User.markdownDescription:
The user who has the permissions to access files and folders in the FSx for Windows file system.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 104  
Pattern: ^[^\x5B\x5D\\/:;|=,+*?]{1,104}$  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

LocationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon FSx for Windows file system location that is created.
LocationArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon FSx for Windows file system location that is created.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):datasync:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:location/loc-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

LocationUri.description: The URL of the FSx for Windows location that was described.
LocationUri.markdownDescription:
The URL of the FSx for Windows location that was described.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4356  
Pattern: ^(efs|nfs|s3|smb|fsxw)://[a-zA-Z0-9./\-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
